text: Joshua Thomas Radnor (born July 29, 1974) is an American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known for playing Ted Mosby on the CBS sitcom How I Met Your Mother. Radnor was born in Ohio. == Other websites == * Category:1974 births Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American writers Category:Jewish screenwriters Category:Actors from Columbus, Ohio Category:Screenwriters from Ohio Category:Democrats (United States) Category:Living people
title: Josh Radnor
